description: Finds a value in a list that match a search string or regular expression.

input.name: pattern
input.description: A string or a regular expression to be searched for within the list. Regular expressions must be wrapped with / character (e.g. /.*/).

output.name: value
output.description: The value of the first element in the list that match the testing expression; otherwise, null is returned.

output.name: index
output.description: The one-based index of first element in the list that match the testing expression; otherwise, null is returned.
